dropzone.description: Drop your file here to send

new_messages_song.queue: Sound for new messages from contacts waiting in the queue
new_messages_song.in_progress: Sound for new messages in ongoing chats

automatic_message.title: Automatic message
automatic_message.info: Define an automatic response to be sent to the contact while they are waiting for assistance, leave it blank if you don’t want any message.
automatic_message.placeholder: You haven't set an automatic message yet. Please define a message for your contacts who are waiting.

without_chats: Oops! It looks like there are no chats at the moment :)

link.title: Link
link.label: Link to an existing project
link.editing_disclaimer: It is not possible to edit the linked project, if you wish to edit the link you must create a new sector and select the desired project.
link.has_linked_project: The selected project is already associated with another sector, select another project to continue.

add.label: Add manager

limit_agents.label: Limit on the number of simultaneous calls per agent

additional_options.title: Extras options
additional_options.edit_custom_fields: Allow agents to edit Custom Fields

agents_signature.tooltip: Each message exchanged will have the name of the agent who is answering

name: Name
in_progress_tooltip: Number of chats that are already being handled by an agent
in_progress_tooltip_filtered: Number of chats that have been handled by an agent
wait_time_tooltip: It is the average time the contact waits to be assisted
wait_assistance_tooltip: Number of contacts waiting to start assistance
average_time_to_assistance_tooltip: Average time contacts wait before being assisted
average_time_to_response_tooltip: Average time the contact waits to be responded to
average_time_to_complete_assistence_tool: Average time for a complete assistance
average_response_time: It is the average response time to the contact
average_interaction_time: It is the average duration of a chat

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.needs_improvement_text: Help us improve summaries. Your feedback on this summary helps us make it clearer and more useful.
feedback.empty_rating: Was this summary useful to you?
feedback.placeholder: Share your feedback to help us improve.

room_pin.error_pin_limit: You can pin up to {max_pin_limit} chats

chats.tags_help: Tags help you locate chats and also generate good reports

transfer.does_not_have_permission: You do not have permission to transfer this chat

chats.get_chat_confirmation: Confirm if you want to do the service of {contact}
chats.get_chat_error: Error when trying to get the room

chats.error_update_queues: Unable to update your service queues
chats.queue_priority_disclaimer: Queue chats are now automatically assigned.

sector_update_error: Unable to save changes, please try again later.
sector_invalid_work_hour: Start time cannot be later than end time

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are used to classify service characteristics and enable chat search and filtering from them, define tags that are relevant to their context.

bulk_transfer.queue_transfer_success: Contact successfully transferred to queue {queue} | Contacts successfully transferred to queue {queue}

disclaimer.selected_agent_offline: The selected agent is offline at the moment
disclaimer.without_online_agents: No online agent at the moment

contact_info.title: Contact information
contact_info.switch_tooltip: Enable if you want the contact to always be directly assigned to you
contact_info.copy_protocol: Click to copy the Ticket ID

close.title: Arrange
close.description: You can no longer exchange messages in this discussion

add_agents.title: Add Agents
add_agents.description: When adding an agent in the discussion it will not be possible to remove later

errors.already_open: Error starting discussion, check if there is already another discussion open
errors.permission: Error starting discussion, check your permission

alert_last_message_date.message: No response from the contact for more than 24 hours, to resume the conversation
alert_last_message_date.tip: WhatsApp privacy policy does not allow sending a message with a contact that does not respond for more than 24 hours.

text_editor_placeholder: Enter a new message or use a /shortcut
title: Title

delete_queue_modal.description: The queue {queue} will be permanently deleted.

sector_delete_error: Unable to delete sector, please try again later.

successfully_transferred_contact_to.line: The contact was forwarded to the {name} line

send_docs: Send doc | Send doc | Send docs
send_images: Send image | Send image | Send images

flows_trigger.subtitle: Contacts of {project}

already_open_room.with_agent: in progress with agent {agent} in queue {queue}

quick_messages.title: Quick messages
quick_messages.without_messages: For now you do not have quick messages, add one :)

without_messages_shared.start: For now there are no quick messages in this sector,
without_messages_shared.end: for agents in this sector to use.

quick_messages.example_message_description: Quick messages are ready-made texts that help standardize customer service. All agents in this sector will be able to use these messages, and you can register new messages below.
quick_messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you'd like to delete quick message?
quick_messages.copilot: Now ChatGPT is your CoPilot! Use the answers suggested by Artificial Intelligence to speed up your calls!

on_boarding.title: Getting started with Chats
on_boarding.description_sector: Create a sector to manage a service team, you can create as many sectors as you want, so you can manage your service groups by departments, products or services.
on_boarding.description_queues: Use queues to segment your calls by subject or products, if you don't want to, just create a queue.
on_boarding.description_tags: Create tags to classify chats, tags can be used to generate reports, filter calls in the history and much more!
on_boarding.tooltip: Chats is Weni's human service module, check out the step by step to get started

copilot.name: CoPilot
copilot.try_again: Try again in a few moments, if it persists, notify the project administrator.

custom_rules.title: CoPilot rules
custom_rules.explanation: Write here instructions for the CoPilot as for example “use an emoji in the answer”

integration.start: To use, integrate with ChatGPT by
integration.end: the CoPilot offers prompt responses based on the contact's service history.

config_chats.title: Chat Settings
config_chats.section_sectors_subtitle: Add, view and manage sectors, queues, managers and agents within your organization.

custom_breaks.title: Custom breaks
custom_breaks.description: Add new custom breaks, all of which will have the same behavior as offline, i.e. the agent will not receive contacts while using these custom breaks.
custom_breaks.status_exceeded_limit: Status limit reached, delete to add new status
custom_breaks.status_error: Oops, unfortunately the changes were not saved, please try again

bulk_transfer.tooltip: This function allows agents to transfer various contacts at once to a row or agent

queue_prioritization.tooltip: This function allows agents to choose the queues that will receive contacts, within those previously selected in the sector

block_transfer_to_off_agents.switch_active: Blocking transfers to offline agents active
block_transfer_to_off_agents.switch_inactive: Blocking transfers to offline agents inactive

edit_sector.description: Determine General Team Settings and Workday
edit_sector.tag_already_exists: A tag with that name already exists
edit_sector.invalid_hours: Start time cannot be greater/equal to end time

queues.info: Queues are support groups within a sector; it is possible to direct contacts from a flow to a specific queue
queues.hint: Queues are support groups within the sector; you can create new queues or edit them whenever you want.

message.config_agents_group: Add or remove agents through groups by going to Chat Settings > Groups

manager.label: Add managers

agents.label: Add agent
agents.placeholder: Search by the name or email

discart.title: Discard changes
discart.text: The creation of the new group will be discarded upon confirming this action. Do you want to discard the changes made so far?

groups.create_error: Failed to configure some steps in the group! Check the details and try again if you identify any missing configurations.
groups.update_error: We had problems updating some data. Check the information and try again if anything is missing.

delete.title: Delete {groupName}
delete.notice: This action will be irreversible. To confirm the action, please type the name of the group
delete.error: Failed to delete group. Please try again.

copilot.hint: The Co-pilot is your agent's intelligent assistant; it can be activated later.

new_sector.sector_tip: Create a sector to manage the fulfillment operation, including roles, agents and management hours
new_sector.queues_tip: The queues serve to organize the types of service within a sector, through the queues it is possible to create service groups, create at least one queue to manage a team of agents
new_sector.tags_tip: Tags are used to classify service characteristics and make it possible to search and filter chats from them, define tags that are relevant to your context
new_sector.agent_tip: Add members to your project to be able to set as a manager

alert.create_error: Failed to configure some steps in the sector! Check the details and try again if you identify any missing configurations.

discart.title: Discard changes
discart.hint: The creation of the new sector will be discarded upon confirming this action. Do you want to discard the changes made so far?

no_matches_for_the_search: There are no matches for the search
